name: Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
description: A beloved children's melody often taught to beginner piano learners.

name: Mary Had a Little Lamb
description: A simple and popular nursery rhyme, often used as an introductory piece for piano learners.

name: Ode to Joy
description: A well-known melody from Beethoven's Symphony No. 9, often played by piano learners due to its recognizable and uplifting nature.

name: Minuet in D Minor
description: A charming and elegant minuet by Bach, suitable for intermediate piano learners.

name: Canon in D
description: A timeless and popular baroque piece, frequently chosen by piano learners for its beautiful harmonies and melodic progression.

name: Air on the G String
description: A serene and delicate piece from Bach's orchestral suite No. 3, often arranged for piano and enjoyed by learners for its soothing qualities.

name: FÃ¼r Elise
description: A famous classical piano piece composed by Ludwig van Beethoven, characterized by its memorable melody and moderate difficulty, making it a popular choice for piano learners.

name: Goldberg Variations Aria
description: The beautiful and introspective opening theme of Bach's Goldberg Variations, often explored by advanced piano learners for its technical and expressive challenges.

name: Moonlight Sonata (1st Movement)
description: The hauntingly beautiful and emotionally evocative first movement of Beethoven's Moonlight Sonata, frequently studied by intermediate to advanced piano learners.

name: Clair de Lune
description: A dreamy and impressionistic piece from Debussy's Suite bergamasque, admired by piano learners for its ethereal atmosphere and delicate nuances.
